headline: Intuit Inc. (INTU) Launched a New Campaign with Uber Advertising
summary: ​Intuit Inc. (NASDAQ:INTU) is one of the Best Dip Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On February 17, Intuit Inc. (NASDAQ:INTU) launched a new campaign with Uber Advertising to make in-person tax help more accessible by bridging the gap between taxpayers and trusted financial expertise. ​This move is part of the company’s strategy to […]

headline: Baidu Inc. (BIDU) Boosts Global Ride-Hailing Presence
summary: Baidu, Inc. (NASDAQ:BIDU) is one of the best emerging markets stocks to buy right now. On February 10, Baidu, Inc. (NASDAQ:BIDU) joined forces with Uber Technologies to launch the Apollo Go autonomous ride-hailing service in Dubai in the coming month. The autonomous vehicles are to operate in select locations, with plans to expand across Jumeirah […]

headline: Klarna pursues ‘Uber’ style customer service model
summary: “If AI can do customer service, it means it’s going to be the cheap customer service,” Klarna CEO Sebastian Siemiatkowski said. “We said the future of VIP experience will be the human connection, the relationship.”

raw.headline: Klarna pursues ‘Uber’ style customer service model
raw.summary: “If AI can do customer service, it means it’s going to be the cheap customer service,” Klarna CEO Sebastian Siemiatkowski said. “We said the future of VIP experience will be the human connection, the relationship.”
